Introduction

Jisun, formerly known as JN, is a South Korean singer. She's a former member and Lead Vocalist and Sub Rapper of South Korean pop girl group Girl's Day under DreamT Entertainment, a former member and Leader, Vocalist, and Dancer of South Korean girl group New.F.O under 6Theory and EnterArts Global, and former member and Leader, Lead Vocalist, Main Dancer and Rapper of South Korean girl group S#aFLA (ShaFLA) under Vine Entertainment.

Prior to her debut, she took part in the 19th Hanbyul Music Festival, where she received the grand prize for her personally produced choreography in 2006.

Jisun originally debuted in the South Korean pop girl group Girl's Day under DreamT Entertainment as an original member with their debut single "Tilt My Head" on the 7th of July 2010. However, only two months after their debut, on September 12, 2010, it was announced that she and fellow member Jang Hyeri (at the time known as Ji In) had left the group. Her reason being she decided to leave to pursue her own interests.

Later on the 25th of November 2011, she re-debuted as an original member and Leader, Vocalist, and Dancer of the South Korean girl group New.F.O, under 6Theory and EnterArts Global with the group's debut digital single "Bounce" under the new stage name JN. Shortly after their debut the group presumably disbanded sometime in June 2012 after announcements of the group had stopped.

After being announced as a member of South Korean girl group S#aFLA under Vine Entertainment, on the 18th of September 2018 Jisun officially re-debuted in the group with their debut digital single "S#aFLA NO.1" with "DDu-Ru-DDu-PPa-Ra-Ppa" serving as their promotional track under her previous stage name Jisun. But the group presumably disbanded in late 2019 after the group stopped celebrating members' birthdays on their official accounts and all the members besides Yujin were unfollowed by Vine Entertainment.

On the 6th of May 2022 Tango Music, Hoon's current agency announced that U-Kiss' Hoon would be marrying former Girl's Day, New.F.O, and S#aFLA member Jisun on the 19th of May 2022. Then later on the 4th of October 2023, Hoon announced that he and Jisun were expecting a son. Following the announcement on the 2nd of January 2024, Hoon announced on X, formerly known as Twitter the birth of their son.
